name: figma-ui-reviewer
description: Figma UI Reviewer with Claude AI

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:plugin
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch -w backend" "npm run test:watch -w figma-plugin"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w backend && npm run test:coverage -w figma-plugin
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci -w backend && npm run test:ci -w figma-plugin
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w backend && npm run type-check -w figma-plugin
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check
